column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////hm. chicago deep dish was not what i expected. i thought it would be sorta like "mountain pie" from beau jo's in colorado
column2: but the crust was thin and it was wayyy more cheese than anything else... like an overwhelming
column3: nauseating amount. can't complain about the value though because their pizzas are pretty cheap
column4: but i much prefer ny style (grimaldi's ftw)!
